error_send: ❌ Unable to send message. Please retry
error_expired: ❌ The request is expired! Please make a new one
start:
🕊️ Liberty Media Bot v.{version}

💜 Author: Fern Lane (aka F3RNI)
😺 GitHub page: https://github.com/F33RNI/liberty-media-telegram-bot

💬 Now send me a search request or a link to download
Example: `f3rni veil of tomorrow`
error_queue_full: ❌ The queue is full! Wait a bit and try again
search_result_suffix: Please select result to download using buttons below 👇
search_no_results: 🚫 No results. Try rephrasing your request
format_select: Please select a format to download using the buttons below 👇
format_no_streams: 🚫 No formats found. Perhaps the selected media is too large? Try searching again and select a different result
rename_audio:
Select the correct audio file name (must be in "Artist - Track Title" format) using the buttons below 👇

Or **write it as message** in the `Artist - Track Title` format

Example:
F3RNI - What's Next?
rename_error:
Incorrect format! Please try again

Example:

F3RNI - What's Next?
